name: The Kingdom's in Ruin
description:
An evil undead sorcerer has conquered the kingdom and you must go defeat him to get the kingdom back.

Made for the Boss Rush Jam: https://itch.io/jam/boss-rush-jam-2021

Unfortunately was only able to finish 2 bosses because I draw so slow.

Sound effects I used were from: https://sidearm-studios.itch.io/ultimate-sound-fx-bundle and https://www.humblebundle.com/software/music-sound-effects-for-games-files-conten...
